author: andschwa
body: They've been removed from monad linux.  We are consuming these as a submodule, now we just need the Jenkins job to drop them into the repo.  VSO create date - 6/3/2015 15:47:00     VSO closed date - 10/29/2015 20:45:00
title: Make linux build fetch the makegenout build artifacts automatically (and remove them from monad-linux.git)
